mapper.insert: insert into TrustSimilarity_tab(user_id1, user_id2, mediumUserId, jacCard, personSimilarity, trustSimilarity, ifDtrust) values(#{userId1}, #{userId2}, #{mediumUserId}, #{jacCard}, #{personSimilarity}, #{trustSimilarity}, #{ifDtrust})
mapper.select: select user_id1 as userId1,user_id2 as userId2,mediumUserId,jacCard,personSimilarity, trustSimilarity, ifDtrust from TrustSimilarity_tab WHERE ifDtrust=true and (user_id1 = #{userId}) or (user_id2 = #{userId})

select user_id1 as userId1,user_id2 as userId2,mediumUserId,jacCard,personSimilarity, trustSimilarity, ifDtrust from TrustSimilarity_tab WHERE ifDtrust=false and (user_id1 = #{userId}) or (user_id2 = #{userId})
